item.title: [HTB] Machine: Forest
item.description: Forest Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -sC -sV -Pn 10.10.10.161 -T4 Starting Nmap 7.93 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-06-26 16:32 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.161 (10.10.10.161) Host is up (0.15s latency). item.title: [HTB] Machine: Escape
